data.title: parma + Maria Francesca
data.meta_description: Luigi of Bourbon-parma, b.5 DEC 1899, Austria; + Maria Francesca, b.26 DEC 1914, Rome, Lazio, Italy, dau of Victor Emmanuel III of Italy + Elena of Montenegro

Prince Luigi of Bourbon-parma

Birth5 DEC 1899Death4 DEC 1967

Aged: 68 years

Princess Maria Francesca

Birth26 DEC 1914Death7 DEC 2000

Aged: 86 years

Maria Francesca di Savoia (Rome, 26 December 1914 - Mandelieu, 7 December 2000) complete name Maria Francesca Anna Romana, is the daughter of the King of Italy Vittorio Emanuele III and of Queen Elena.

She married in Rome on 23 January 1939 to Prince Luigi of Bourbon-Parma.

Their issues are:

* Prince Guido "Guy" Siste Louis Robert Victor (1 August 1940 - 10 March 1991) * Prince Remigio "Rémy" Francois (14 July 1942) * Princess Chantal Maria (24 November 1946) * Prince Jean Bernard Rémy (15 October 1961)
